snippet: Ford Motor Co said on Tuesday the company will drop the Pimco Total Return Fund from its 401k plan as a result of the sudden departure of Bill Gross....

headline.print_headline: Ford Motor Says Will Drop Pimco Total Return Fund From Its 401k Plan
headline.main: Ford Motor Says Will Drop Pimco Total Return Fund From Its 401k Plan

lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Co said on Tuesday the company will drop the Pimco Total Return Fund from its 401k plan as a result of the sudden departure of Bill Gross.
